1631440.name: Dwarven - Mining Dungeons
1631440.description:
The King underneath the mountain has been dyspeptic.
His once so proud dwarf folk is getting lazy and comfortable. The shine in their eyes defunct just like the fire in the mines deep underneath the rocky mountains.

One day the King himself takes some rest at your tavern, which lays near the mines, to make an Exempel. You shall bring new life into this rusty tavern. For this he compiles you some adventurers and miners. Their task is to search for new intervened ores, dig them up, proceed them of sale and bring new shine to the Tavern.

Get yourself as many friends and companions as you can and get to work - to make the king proud of you.

Features

• Online coop up to 4 players
• Classes, that synchronize and harmonize together
• Big, random dungeons which always want to be new explored
• Countless danger will await you at the dark
• Customizable characters with upgrades
• Refurnish your tavern with dwarf charme
1631440.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
